channel.title: Display Names
channel.description:
Are completely unusable at the moment due to the lack of availability of runescape-related services. Can anyone say garage company?
I think this topic sums it up nicely: http://forum.runescape.com/forums.ws?129,130,242,59653989

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

I still think display names is a bad update

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

oh didnt read you can renew it…

[quote=“la­wl, post:38, topic:305575”][quote author=Frell link=topic=401814.msg2996875#msg2996875 date=1255659955]
Holy shit sorry guys haha.

If you dont change or renew your display name during the 7 days you have to change it every month it will go back to your original username.
[/quote]
thats gay[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:39, topic:305575”]no…its to prevent this:

[quote author=Davidude link=topic=401814.msg2995184#msg2995184 date=1255545367]
What was even the point in this? If someone gets a rare display name and never changes it then its gone forever?

It’s the same as normal names?
[/quote][/quote]
no, cause it doesnt prevent it… you can still keep your display name forever

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119

@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:35, topic:305575”][quote author=Frell link=topic=401814.msg2996713#msg2996713 date=1255652749]
And if you dont change it within the 7 days after the 28 days to revert back to your normal username.
[/quote]
either you fucked up grammar or i fucked up reading[/quote]i was thinking the same thing…

i must have read it over 5 times

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:28, topic:305575”][quote author=Davidude link=topic=401814.msg2995184#msg2995184 date=1255545367]
What was even the point in this? If someone gets a rare display name and never changes it then its gone forever?

It’s the same as normal names?
[/quote]
the point is so people can change their name[/quote]

incorrect,
if my username was originally M lets just say
and i change it to Maddiie, im always going to have the username M because it is the username i use to log into my account
no matter how many times i change it you always login with your original meaning its still taken.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Him and Die was the best pking name I saw tbh. Lol nice find, no one can top that. xD

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Original Daniel:

Probably for “malicious website advertising.” If you made an account called 4chan or something it would probably get banned too.

My name is very similar to ‘Me And Die’. I used To Something instead, though.

Now when people right-click me, it says ‘Attack Me To Something’.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Probably for “malicious website advertising.” If you made an account called 4chan or something it would probably get banned too.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:26, topic:305575”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=401814.msg2994748#msg2994748 date=1255499840]

I’m surprised that they don’t offer such a paid service, actually. Mind you, one that changes your actual username rather than just masking it with a display name.
Still, I can’t complain now that I’ve gotten a really appropriate one for my pvp account.

Okay okay I guess I’ll pop the question. What is your really appropriate pvp name?

It would be pretty dumb of him to say here, jagex reads these forums and they could ban him, or at least watch him a lot closer.

He might, I just wouldn’t tell you my RS name.
[/quote]'sif that would ever happen[/quote]

The banning? I’m pretty sure it would happen, my first account ‘moparsthbest’ was banned and I haven’t been able to recover him, coincidence? I think not.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:24, topic:305575”][quote author=Erj link=topic=401814.msg2994108#msg2994108 date=1255468395]

I’m surprised that they don’t offer such a paid service, actually. Mind you, one that changes your actual username rather than just masking it with a display name.
Still, I can’t complain now that I’ve gotten a really appropriate one for my pvp account.

[/quote]

It would be pretty dumb of him to say here, jagex reads these forums and they could ban him, or at least watch him a lot closer.

He might, I just wouldn’t tell you my RS name.[/quote]

Hi I’m zezima. I sure hope jagex doesn’t read this and ban me.

I really doubt they would take the time to ban/watch names posted on forums - their automated macro detection seems to be pretty good anyway unless you use a private bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

f 2 p 2 p f:

So many names are already taken but it might be fun to abuse be someone different every day. How do you ignore people now?

you can only change your name every 28 days…

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

f 2 p 2 p f:

So many names are already taken but it might be fun to abuse be someone different every day. How do you ignore people now?

Your friend list follows display name changes automatically; I presume the ignore list works in the same fashion.

Read full topic

item.title: Display Names
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

the update has its flaws though,
when you see players around runescape that you’d usually associate they sometimes dont recognize you, especially if theyre just a player you see often and dont have added.

that aside its a great update,
it was very hard to update your name though when the update first came out, so i didnt get the name i wanted
but i got close to it

Read full topic
